ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuViews

Class ViewQuestionAndAnswers

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuViews.ViewQuestionAndAnswers
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IView

    public class ViewQuestionAndAnswers
extends Activity
implements IView
    Activity that is responsible for showing a Question. A question can be composed of the question text, a picture related to the question number of upvotes, replies to the question, and all of the answers to the questions which can have answer text, a picture relating to the answer, upvotes, and replies.
    Author:
    wrflemin
    See Also:
    Question, Answer, Picture, Reply
